description: "This map of Asia, from an atlas by the German cartographer Karl von Spruner, is colour-coded to show the possessions of the Indian Maratha Empire, and of the European colonial powers at the end of the 18th century."
title: "Asien   gegen   Ende   des   XVIIIten   Jahrhunderts   (Asia   at   the   end   of   the   18th   century)"
